name: Saucepanhead - Parasite City
description:
A full-on action adventure featuring plucky outsider Saucepanhead as he ventures into the body of his friend Professor Baxter in a bid to destroy an onslaught of menacing viruses.

The inner body levels are procedurally generated, rendered in retro pixel style 3D and it's all held together by a blistering heavy metal soundtrack.

This is a free game that we made to explore the RPG Maker MV system and associated plugins. We'd love to hear your thoughts about the game!
